dict.acceptation: 温柔地；轻轻地；有礼貌地；文雅地；

sent.orig: I leave softly, gently, Exactly as I came. I wave sky, Telling it goodbye softly, gently.
sent.trans: 轻轻的我走了，正如我轻轻的来，我轻轻的招手，作别西天的云彩。

sent.orig: To use Smooth a small amount gently over the face, and wipe gently after cleansing.
sent.trans: 使用方法：洁肤后，取少量置于面部，轻轻涂匀全面。

sent.orig: Christmas on tiptoe, walked briskly, despite her gently, gently out of your mind look forward to!
sent.trans: 圣诞节踮着脚尖，轻快地走来，请迎着她轻轻地，轻轻地说出你心中的期待！

sent.orig: After the ear wax earwax is gone, gently gently dry your the ear.
sent.trans: 耳垢清除后，轻轻地擦拭耳朵。

sent.orig: The sea breeze gently blowing you, The waves gently rocking you, How hard the young sailor.
sent.trans: 海风你轻轻地吹，海浪你轻轻地摇，年轻的水兵多么辛劳。
